answer:
Although the recommended interval between 2 doses of Shingrix is 2 to 6 months, the National Advisory Committee on Immunization states that the 2nd dose can be given as soon as 1 month after the 1st. If you have further questions or concerns, please contact your health care provider.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## Although the recommended interval between 2 doses of Shingrix is 2 to 6 months, the National Advisory Committee on Immunization states that the 2nd dose can be given as soon as 1 month after the 1st.


## If you have further questions or concerns, please contact your health care provider.

Immunization Nurse
question: Is this ok???? Pharmacist pressed me to get the 2nd SHINGRIX shot b 4 the 2 months, & coaxed me into getting it at 54 days. I know others worried it is too soon, B 4 two mos. ???
